TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoginName extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

span.span: Displays the value of the property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 根據預設，控制項顯示名稱中包含屬性類別。By default, the control displays the name contained in the property of the class. 如果`System.Web.UI.Page.User.Identity.Name`屬性是空的則不會呈現控制項。If the `System.Web.UI.Page.User.Identity.Name` property is empty, the control is not rendered. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 中可用的登入控制項組，請參閱[ASP.NET 登入控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d)才能繼續。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d) before continuing. 如需登入控制項及成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用成員資格管理使用者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 若要變更所顯示的文字控制，請設定屬性。To change the text displayed by the control, set the property. > [!NOTE] > 控制項不能用外`
`標記在網頁上。The control cannot be used outside the `` tag on a Web page. 具體來說，不能用來將使用者的名稱放在頁面的標題。Specifically, the cannot be used to put the user's name in the title of a page. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用頁面上的類別。The following code example shows how to use the class on a page. 按一下按鈕變更的顯示格式。Clicking the button changes the display format. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginNameTextFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginNameTextFormat/CS/loginnametextformatcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginNameTextFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginNameTextFormat/VB/loginnametextformatvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string FormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string FormatString
Public Overridable Property FormatString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ FormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 提供要顯示的格式項目字串。

span.span: Provides a format item string to display.

value.span: 字串，包含顯示使用者名稱的格式項目。

span.span: A string containing format items for displaying the user's name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含在網頁上顯示的使用者名稱的標準文字格式字串。The property contains a standard text format string that displays the user's name on the Web page. 字串"{0}"表示插入的使用者名稱字串的位置。The string "{0}" indicates where in the string the user's name is inserted. 下表描述可用的屬性設定。The following table describes the available property settings. |屬性設定Property setting|行為Behavior| |----------------------|--------------| |預設值 （"{0}")Default ("{0}")|使用者的名稱會顯示當使用者登入。否則，不會顯示。The user's name is displayed when the user is logged on; otherwise, nothing is displayed.| ||預設值相同。Same as default. 若要隱藏控制項，請設定屬性`false`。To hide the control, set the property to `false`.| |[歡迎使用我的網站，{0}。]"Welcome to my site, {0}."|顯示字串"歡迎使用我的站台*username*。 」Displays the string "Welcome to my site, *username*." 當使用者登入。when the user is logged in. 當使用者未登入時，則不會顯示任何內容。When the user is not logged in, nothing is displayed.| |[歡迎使用我的網站。]"Welcome to my site."|當屬性設定為字串時，字串會顯示當使用者登入。When the property is set to a string, the string is displayed when the user is logged in. 字串不包含"{0}"，因為不會顯示使用者的名稱。Because the string does not contain "{0}", the user's name is not displayed. 當使用者未登入時，則不會顯示任何內容。When the user is not logged in, nothing is displayed.| 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用頁面上的屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property on a page. 按一下按鈕變更的顯示格式。Clicking the button changes the display format. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginNameTextFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginNameTextFormat/CS/loginnametextformatcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginNameTextFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginNameTextFormat/VB/loginnametextformatvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The format string is not valid.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool SupportsDisabledAttribute { get; }
.property instance bool SupportsDisabledAttribute
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsDisabledAttribute As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SupportsDisabledAttribute { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示當控制項的 屬性為 時，控制項是否應該將呈現之 HTML 項目的 屬性設為 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果屬性表示的 ASP.NET 版本低於4.0，否則。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指出如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .
